website_summaries.verdict: It’s hard to beat this ultra-light, seamless screen design, and high resolution display- especially for the price.
cons: Although its screen features rich colors and a crisp display, this is a step down from 4K

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Clear crisp image, extremely thin monitor. looks space age. I checked it out at Best Buy first (frankly I would've bought it there, but the employees were so busy they ignored me and I was like "this is why Amazon is winning," and I walked out of the store and bought it here). I am using two monitors now, so I needed to buy an extra cable, but if you are just using one you just need an HDMI cable. Really a stunning monitor.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Saving my sight
customer_reviews.text: Just the thing I needed to save my sight while post processing photographs on my Surface Pro 3. While my Surface Pro 3 is a great device, the screen is sort of small when it comes to post photography photo processing. The HP 27er produces large clear images and its screen is matte so there is no glare, no eye strain. It works for me. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FOR READING! Video quality is good though.
customer_reviews.text: I played around with the contrast, sharpness and other settings on the monitor and on my laptop for three hours to make this monitor work with my Macbook Pro. No matter what I did, the text always appeared blurry and gave me an instant headache. The preset settings for text are also atrocious. I need to read many hours each day and am returning this product. This product gets two stars; however, because the image quality was great and videos were crisp.
customer_reviews.author: dra2087

customer_reviews.title: Purple tint problems
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture, and easy to set up. However, I purchased two of these, and they both have the same problem. When the screen wakes up from the screen saver, it has an unsightly purplish tint. The only way I have found to get rid of it is to unplug the monitor and plug it back in, which is very annoying. The monitors are being used as dual screens, and the hassle totally negates the convenience of having a second monitor. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: The Amazonian A-Hole

customer_reviews.title: This is old school
customer_reviews.text: Hey I did purchase 4 this and I am so upset because this screens doesn't have these 4 holes on the back,now my question to HP...What world are your engineer??? This so freck'n old school has this thing sit on the table...(zero star ) Antonio Paulista from Boston
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Paulista

customer_reviews.title: Purple tint/static upon waking
customer_reviews.text: Upon waking the monitor up from sleep this thing either has a weird looking purple tint to it or the entire screen is static-y. I have to turn the monitor off and on, sometimes a few times, before it looks normal again. If the seller or HP themselves want to make this right feel free to contact me
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: monitor is great. text isn't the best but that's due to 1080p as max resolution. to get better resolution I'd have to pay WAY more so I can deal with it since it's not heavy work related. I do like that I can put two docs/browsers side by side to easily compare things with plenty of view. wide viewing angle is good. movies and such look fine. I don't do games so not comment there. overall for the price I paid I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: 8 months in and I'm calling warranty
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this, I read the reviews. The one point that the other reviews alerted me of is the tendency for the screen to "black out" for no apparent reason. In the beginning, this happened seldom and it didn't bother me. Now, 8 months later, it happens a few times during the hour. It is a nuisance. I am on the phone with HP warranty as I type this up. The monitor is nice. It is thin. However, it does not have height adjustment. I regret not buying one that has height adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is absolutely amazing for the price. Next to a 24" screen, it looks huge. The user interface is superior as well, for example you can set one of the physical buttons to brightness and change the settings with just a few buttons. This is important if your lighting conditions change between daytime and evening light. The frame itself is beautiful; the bezel is thin; the back is clean and bright meaning you can use this in a variety of settings and especially great in an open workplace. It's not as vivid as a $500 screen, but with max contrast it looks incredible considering this is roughly one third of that cost. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Klassen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor as a second monitor for spreadsheets and word processing documents. It is easy to adjust color and brightness to desired level. It provides a pretty crisp image. I also use it for streaming Netflix shows and sports to play in the background while I work. I'm no techno-phile but the picture is really, really nice and the refresh-rate seems adequate for streaming TV. Definitely no complaints after a few weeks of use...
customer_reviews.author: Brady Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this monitor. I haven't had any issues with it, and the picture quality is great. There are two things I would like to share about this monitor. #1 - There are no built in speakers. I thought that there were, but there are not. It's still a great monitor, but if you need speakers make sure that you order some separately. #2 - I would recommend a small monitor riser. It's not incredibly low, but the screen is not adjustable so it the screen sits slightly low. I will eventually purchase a small riser for more comfortable viewing. Overall, I am very pleased with this monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Newlin

customer_reviews.title: Built beautifully. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Packing was great. The monitor is built beautifully. Very slim and no plastic bezels on top. It does have a screen border all around. I was able to put it together in few minutes. There were two issues that I noticed within few hours. First right corner of the screen is washed out and second white lines started travelling across the screen when it was on sleep. It could be a great PC monitor but im using it with Xbox and it's just not working out. With Xbox the colors arnt as vibrant as other users have found. I found then a bit washed out. Sending it back and trying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Adeel

customer_reviews.title: Very wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give this a bad review. Overall it’s not a bad monitor but I can’t stand how much it wobbles back and fourth. The stand mechanism / the way it connects with the monitor was poorly done. Anytime you type the entire screen starts to move. In addition, the button fixture on the bottom was poorly assembled. Otherwise it’s not bad. Picture is good and it has a sleek silver/ white design.
customer_reviews.author: M Avolio

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a couple days and then died.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor worked for a couple days and then died. Besides that, the monitor was easy to set up and look good. However, the stand connection to the monitor was a little lose, so the monitor leaned to one side.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: A very nice looking Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This Monitor is not, and I really mean it, is not for text display. If you want a monitor for reading articles or any type of text, get something else. It looks beautiful, displays pictures very well, good brightness, 2 HDMI ports. But the poor text display killing my eyes. My old Viewsonic and my newer Samsung monitors have much better text displays. Not happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kafi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and picture quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as an external monitor to use at home with my macbook pro 16". The picture quality is great for work (using word, excel, etc.) I haven't used it gaming however I imagine that this monitor is acceptable. I spend 8hrs+ a day on a computer and i haven't noticed my eyes tiring with this monitor. It does have the anti-blue light which is a nice feature I gave the picture quality 4 stars since the clarity isn't as great as the retina display on Macs; however, you can't beat the price. Product comes with it's own hdmi cable which is awesome. I liked this monitor so much that I ended up getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marie

customer_reviews.title: Now has a vertical purple line running donw center of screen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of them about 2 years ago and in the last week one of them has developed vertical purple line running down the center of the monitor. As per HP I tried it on another PC and different connections and reset it. line remains
customer_reviews.author: Eric G. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great 27" Monitors! I Bought Three and Love Them
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and decided to buy a third. The third one had some issues but Amazon was quick to resolve the issue. In fact, I received the replacement monitor in less than 24 hours! I've been using two of the 27es models at work for over a year now without any issues. These monitors offer a superb image quality and their large format greatly increases productivity. I'm using the three I purchased for CAD work. I frequently have multiple CAD programs open simultaneously and these monitors make working an absolute pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: ThatOneGuy

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Crazy good monitors, but with a flaw...
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, modern, and sleek, are all attributes to describe these HP 27er monitors. I picked a pair of them up because of the frameless edges and solid bar across the bottom. Two HDMI inputs and a VGA connector show how these can be used for multiple connections. On the downside... I’m not happy about having to buy VESA adaptors just to be able to mount these to a dual monitor mount. HP should create their own bracket that would look better than what can be bought third party. Other than this, I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Motowii

customer_reviews.title: Really an excellent monitor!
customer_reviews.text: These monitors are great. I have two of them. One is slightly brighter/focused than the other which is probably just some adjustment I need to manually do in the settings. Physically, one is also slightly (not even a centimeter) taller than the other. I am autistic with severe eye to detail and OCD, so this is noticable to me but maybe not for others. But it's minor and the quality is superb! I don't play video games, so I didn't rate that attribute. The bezel-less frame is awesome and so very sleek!! They're very professional looking.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Thin 27” 1080p
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful screen, very thin, 1080p at a cheap price. The only cons to this screen is the stand. The stand can be kinda wobbly, and has come unclipped before. As long as the screen stays on the desk with no movement it’s perfect. There are two models: T3M88AA#ABA which has white back, and T3M86AA#ABA which has a black back. I picked up the 88 model (HP 27er) from Amazon, and picked my second one up 86 model (HP 27es) from Best Buy. Highly recommend if you need a beautiful 1080p 27” display.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great picture Large screen Easy setup Cons: Limited adjustability Power supply is separate from the monitor I bought two of these monitors for a school computer to provide plenty of work space. These work great. The stands don’t offer a height adjustment, but that wasn’t a big deal for me. The power supply is like what you would expect for a laptop—with a block to find a place for. Overall, as a monitor, it is great. Some design elements could be better, but the cost was appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, but not edge-to-edge
customer_reviews.text: I am enormously impressed by the display color balance, clarity, and brightness. I am very sensitive to flicker, but even at 60 Hz, the display is rock solid and does not fatigue my eyes. My only gripe is that the product description stated "With no bezel encircling the display [...] provides for seamless multi-monitor set-ups." HP really needs to remove that statement. As other reviewers have noted, there is a 3/8" black strip around three sides (accurately shown in product picture) so multiple monitors are not seamless. The HP Marketing hype creates an expectation the hardware can't meet, leaving the purchaser unsatisfied with an otherwise fine display for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Earlix

customer_reviews.title: Nice display!
customer_reviews.text: Nice display. Backlight and color is pretty bright and vivid too. I'd say the only annoyance is the no-signal prompt flashing on and off when I turn off or unplug my laptop instead of the monitor powering down in sleep mode like any other monitor (see video). Editing my comment about the no-signal prompt: apparently it's because of the Surface Pro 5 or its Surface Dock. I moved this HP monitor to another computer and used an ASUS 24-inch monitor for my Surface Pro 5 and when turning it off, even the ASUS monitor would flash "no-signal" on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Nay Family

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Monitor is 8 months old, and no longer works. I actually bought two at the same time, and less than a year later, neither of them can even be powered-on. Emailed and called HP repeatedly, since the monitors were allegedly under warranty for one year, but they were completely unresponsive. Received plenty of emails giving me a 'case #' but that was the end of it. I will never buy an HP product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Box was clearly opened previously.
customer_reviews.text: When I buy something as a "Brand New" I expect it to be brand new, factory sealed etc.. In this case the box was clearly opened previously, so I'm returning it. If I wanted an 'Open Box' I would buy an Open Box and pay a little less. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tints green after not even a month
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even had this for a full month and the monitor has tinted green and become pixelated on half of my screen. I am exchanging this for a new one and will see if the problem persists. Will update once new one arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to place this HP monitor next to my IMAC! The brightness and color are outstanding and almost as good as the IMAC but for a fraction of the cost. You'll be happy with the performance! I suggest upgrading the HDMI cable to 4K and you’ll also need an adapter for your IMAC as well! The dark screen is very rich and vibrant and it’s good to go once you plug it in! This monitor would work great for gaming as well as graphics! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis J. Ohl

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an upgrade to a 22 inch LCD Veiwsonic monitor I got about 10 years ago. The resolution is the same as I got the 1080p IPS version of it but the color, brightness and size are huge improvements over the old one. It's super thin and has a really solid feeling metal stand. Only addition I would make is a DVI Port. I knew it had none going in though so I can't mark a star off for that. No ghosting in game. I also got it for $119 on sale and I can say, for the money, this is a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Torres

customer_reviews.title: It’s already broken.
customer_reviews.text: What’s wrong with this monitor, it worked for two days and now it can’t find the input device!
customer_reviews.author: Dimitar

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long
customer_reviews.text: It's been shutting on and off for the past 4 weeks, I've only had this monitor for maybe 5 months. Today it's died altogether. I have no idea why as it was "new" but this has been a waste of money and a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It arrived quickly and I was very happy with it's look
customer_reviews.text: I bought one thinking it'd be ok given the price. It arrived quickly and I was very happy with it's look, especially how thin it is. If you're used to working on just a laptop you'll shed a tear once you've treated your eyes to this monitor. The next day I ordered one for my wife per her request after seeing mine. I set it up for her and she almost cried because she works with spreadsheets and tables and this monitor not only helps her read, it's bright and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Anh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two HP 27er since I work from home often. The moniters look sleek! I love the color, the weight and how thin it is. Not to mention it doesn’t take up a lot of space on your desk. I previously bought the LG 32MP58HQ-P split monitor and it was trash. So was brand new, yet it has so many issues. I returned it after three days and bought the HP instead. So far the HP has treated me well. However, I am keeping the boxes for 30 days just in case I encounter any problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: does not work well as extended desktop for 5K iMac
customer_reviews.text: works as it should in re connecting, easy to use, but as an extended desktop monitor pairing with iMac 5K retina screen - no no no. wrong choice. resolution is awful. HP cust svc said doesnt have capability to work well with 4K and 5K computers. will re-purpose/give away the instant a reliable auxiliary monitor is available.
customer_reviews.author: little old lady

customer_reviews.title: Blurry and No Freaking headphone Jack
customer_reviews.text: Who in their right mind would make a monitor with no headphone jack and charge more than $150. Screen is huge but blurry and is not worth price.
customer_reviews.author: NDK

customer_reviews.title: Solid monitor
customer_reviews.text: Very light, very sleek. There is some slight wobble on the stand connection, but it's only noticeable if you actually move the monitor by hand (in other words, I never notice it). At this size, I think 1440p is really the right resolution - 1080p is a stretch for text (especially if you're using a high dpi second screen). If you're watching videos, it doesn't really matter. And there's nothing on the market (except maybe for steep sale discounts) that gives that resolution at this size for this price. Viewing angles are good, and so is color. Would give 4.5/5 stars (decided which way to round on a coin flip).
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Really nice colors and a beautiful design with a nice bezel
customer_reviews.text: Really nice colors and a beautiful design with a nice bezel. I'm really happy with this monitor and bought two of them for my parents who are starting to find it harder to read things on smaller displays. The only thing I wish that was improved is a one color design. I know it's not as edgy as this two tone silver scheme but I think the silver steals away from the focus a little. Otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Problem with backlight on new monitor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is nice and big compared to my old HP pavilion monitor, but the one I have came defective and theirs a dark shadow near the bottom right of the screen, this monitor would be perfect for me if it didn't arrive with this issue.
customer_reviews.author: MultiDarkZen

customer_reviews.title: CRYSTAL CLARITY!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Bought the 27” to use with my MacBook Air at my office. Crystal clear and beautiful. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Boesh7678

customer_reviews.title: sold me used product? Not good!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to claim for a warranty before 1 year to find out this product was registered 2 years ago and the warranty was already expired by the time I bought. I thought it was a new bec that is what they said.
customer_reviews.author: doktorx

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bright Display - built to last
customer_reviews.text: My company uses these monitors and we currently are running 18 of these monitors with zero failures. They have beautiful display and color rendition and provide a large viewing surface that promoted productivity. I highly recommend these monitors to anyone looking for a quality work monitor - be it programming, media editing, or just basic web browsing.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Yu

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear Didplay
customer_reviews.text: The display is super clear, bright, & large. Purchased since being required to WFH indefinitely due to Covid-19. Made such a difference in my work display capacity that I immediately wanted to buy another. Note: attached pic is with brightness down to 25% because anything brighter for me was hard on my light-sensitive eyes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very good value monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Small bezels on top and sides make this look really modern. The bottom bezel is silver and is a bit wider than the rest. The display is clear and bright. I've been using it for several months on a daily basis for work and it's had no problems so far. Colors appear natural and the resolution is great. I will update if the monitor has any issues in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: clear images with beautiful color. This monitor is ULTRA THIN and very ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a 24" monitor, so you can imagine the difference. Crisp, clear images with beautiful color. This monitor is ULTRA THIN and very sleek! Looks great on the desktop and provides edge-to-edge screen surface. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy plastic base.  Stripped down from previous models.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this monitor after one day. I have a HP27xi and this model is a flimsy follow on. Not as robust as my 27xi. Picture quality was average at best. Unimpressed for the money paid for it. Bought a 43" 4K TV as a monitor instead (for less $$$ than this thing cost).
customer_reviews.author: Skivywavr

customer_reviews.title: Horinzontal Lines Across Screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these monitors at the same time. One came in perfect condition, no complaints there. The other has horizontal lines across the top third of the screen. I've tried using different ports, different cables, and connecting to different systems to no avail, leaving the monitor itself to be the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner R

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: I sent this HP back. Does not come with a disc to calibrate colors and contrast. If you use the manual IPS function very hard to set anything. HP missed the mark on this unit. Pixels are distorted and scrolling on web pages were highlighting red. I bought another monitor from Dell.
customer_reviews.author: nphxjd31

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I got this a few months before the pandemic situation without knowing.. And I'ts been my office during the quarantine! Very helpful! Excellent product. The only thing is that you can't move the monitor height up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: I've had this monitor for about a year now. The colors are great and it does not make my eyes tired. Great for coding and splitting screens.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known this before I purchased it.
customer_reviews.text: Can only be used in the stand that comes with it. Ordered it to use as a monitor on my CNC machine but you can't mount it to a desktop monitor stand so basically it's useless for the reason I purchased it. To bad too because otherwise its a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: The Concrete Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Not for an iMac. Works great with an HP laptop.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a second monitor for my 2013 iMac 21.5”. It looked pixelated, not crisp because I couldn’t match the resolution of my iMac. I gave it to my daughter for her HP work laptop and the picture is perfect with that.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Nicastro

customer_reviews.title: Great price, okay resolution.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful monitor, but the resolution is not that great compared to my other monitor (Dell u3415w). However it is hard to complain about the price. I also had an issue where in some application the monitor kept on flashing. I had to install the driver from the HP support website to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Sucu

customer_reviews.title: This is the second monitor they sent me both did ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second monitor they sent me both did the same thing by just going to sleep and never waking up
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gough

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking screen, Awful Stand
customer_reviews.text: I'm only a couple weeks in and have had no performance issues and the screen looks great, but the base seems fatally flawed. If your desk is Fort Knox, this might not matter, but if there is even a slight vibration, expect your monitor to bounce around like a jumping jack. I find it a shame how many products overlook such small but critical details.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C. Gerdes

customer_reviews.title: Received a manufactured or used unit when I ordered a new one.
customer_reviews.text: It had obviously been assembled and all the protective plastic were removed. There is a white spot in the bottom right hand corner. Very upset with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Al73Mustang

customer_reviews.title: It’s an inexpensive full sized picture at a budget price.
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is, big picture, But mediocre quality. The stand is not as pictured in the Amazon listing. I need higher quality in a monitor. So I’m returning this in favor of a higher picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Too bright and doesn't really adjust
customer_reviews.text: This gave me vicious headaches. No matter how much you adjust brightness, it really doesn't adjust. It took me too long to realize this monitor is what made my headaches 100 times worse.
customer_reviews.author: Nasser G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Really nice monitor for the price. I thought the white color might bother me but it doesn't. The screen can't stand up against the gorgeous 5K 27" monitor on my iMac but it looks great for the resolution - and low price. I kind of wish it used a traditional plain power cable instead of having an AC adapter brick with a coaxial plug, but the brick should be much easier to replace if it goes out.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality for movies.
customer_reviews.text: Going on two months and no problems. Great picture quality for movies. However, be aware that this monitor's screen is glossy, not matte. I.e., it does reflect. Note this review is for the "27er" 27-inch monitor without speakers (they are mixing reviews for multiple monitors in this list).
customer_reviews.author: Interstitialist

customer_reviews.title: You should find something better.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and works okay AT FIRST. However, The one issue which seemed minor in the beginning is actually a major issue and has become a serious annoyance. Whenever your computer goes to sleep naturally this monitor does as well. But when you turn it back on the color is disfigured. It’s suoer annoying and it takes a long time to adjust back to normal. i wouldn’t advise anyone to buy this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Christina RK

customer_reviews.title: Cannot ignore the FLICKERING!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the quality of this monitor at first, but the flickering is a serious distraction. I see many people have reported this, but I don't see a resolution for this. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: A. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: The item in the images does not match the description/title
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the item after viewing the images and preferring the design over other monitors we viewed on amazon. Unfortunately the monitor we received did not match the images, which are off a different model.
customer_reviews.author: George Kemp

customer_reviews.title: It was great while it worked
customer_reviews.text: It was great while it worked! I purchased this item brand new with the order fulfilled by Amazon for my work desk. In less than four months it started repeatedly turning on and off and going for long periods of time without turning back on. Thinking it may only be the power cord I even tried replacing that - without luck. Now I have this great looking yet useless monitor that sits on my desk and I'm nearly $200 poorer.
customer_reviews.author: Bunch07

customer_reviews.title: So far a good monitor
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a good monitor for general office work and photo and video editing. It would have been nice if it had a digital input, but for what I need it's ok, I just hope it last. The warranty is the shortest compared to other major brands, but I'll take my chances.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, needs sturdier mount.
customer_reviews.text: Display brightness and color spectrum everything you would want in a 1080 monitor. Lack of speakers kept lightweight, but audio-out jack would have been preferable. Stand is extremely light and allows for a slight bit of wobble; would like areas for rear mounts. But at price and thinness acceptable. Very happy with this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: brock

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Very clear, sharp and perfect for the laptop! I love using it! It is incredibly sharp for everything. We can easily read all kinds of documents!! So glad I got this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: New HP Screens.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful screens, but before purchasing make sure that your laptop has the correct hdmi hookup. My work laptop only has vga hook up and a weird looking hdmi hook up. I am having to jump through hoops to try to get these things hooked up. I am not technical savvy and it has been a real pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: As Good as Computer Monitors Get!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dual-monitor setup and had to replace an older HP 27-inch monitor. This model, which now matches a replacement I got a year or two ago, is absolutely fantastic. Reliable, gorgeous, completely satisfactory in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Galleher

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent monitor. The price is VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent monitor. The price is VERY GOOD! Color is sharp, the native resolution is very comfortable, because I haven't adjusted it at all. The tilt angle is great. I am very pleased with the quality of the display. The stand is aluminum and very well built and matches my Macbook Pro 2017. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jael

customer_reviews.title: Great, but everyone so often have to restart
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great monitor. I use it with an imac. The resolution is lower, so when I drag a window over, it gets bigger and takes up more space on the screen. But it is fine. The only issue I have had is that maybe 1x a week, it will be black and not turn back on, even though the connections are secure. If I restart the computer, it starts working again.
customer_reviews.author: fields of LA

customer_reviews.title: Makes everyone in the office jealous
customer_reviews.text: Really nice screens. They look aesthetically amazing and have a very clear, bright picture. The only thing I don't like about it is that black is more dark grey. Some of my older monitors actually do a better job with blacks than this one. It's nice that it is bright enough to be easy to read even in brightly lit rooms, but the contrast is not as good as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: P. White

customer_reviews.title: Missing part #1 (stand bracket) unable to use. Sealing ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing part #1 (stand bracket) unable to use.Sealing tape was cut upon arrival indicating product was 'Open Box'.Very very dissatisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Benneli

customer_reviews.title: Slim Design
customer_reviews.text: Amazing slim design perfect for additional screen for WFH. Matches my HP elitebook perfectly and the silver color almost makes it look like a Mac. Great value for the size and style.
customer_reviews.author: Amber K

customer_reviews.title: Good cost, but mine come with a dead pixel
customer_reviews.text: Its a good monitor and has a very good price. I would give 5 stars if wasnt for the dead pixel that pisses me off every time i remember it (the point is: most part of the time i even forget about it, what shows it is not a major problem... it is just ONE dead pixel). Maybe it was just bad luck of mine. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Renan de Freitas Ongaratto

customer_reviews.title: They work great. Look great
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 on sale for $119 each!!!!! they were cheaper than the 24 inchers at the time. Now they went back up to $195. THIN, LIGHT and LARGE. They work great. Look great. Love them. 2 hdmi and 1 vga port. Could have used some other input options and higher resolutions but that would be nice to haves.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E. Wenger

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 8 Months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April and it just stopped working. For an HP product, I expected a lot more than 8 months out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice screen real estate!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent monitor for my purposes. The 27 inch monitor gives me a lot of real estate as a second monitor for controlling my remote observatory. I had so many opened windows on my laptop that something had to give. The answer was a second monitor. I can now easily monitor how my telescope is slewing in the observatory via two webcams and view important large data screens for auto guiding my telescope's mount via PHD2--with screen real estate still left over.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. William Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor for the price - 3D Modeler
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at how good this monitor is for the price. I've had it for several months now and have had no issues. I use it for digital 2D art, 3D modeling, and light gaming. When my other monitor dies, I will be replacing it with one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lowe

customer_reviews.title: I love them. They are very light
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these screens to hook to my docking station for my Surface Pro. I love them. They are very light! I didn't realize how bad my old screens were until I got these. They are so clear and everything is very easy to read on them. I work with a lot of medical records, claims files and hand written notes. I can decipher things on this screens that others can't see clearly on theirs. These are wonderful, and I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kiwimother

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Large size is good for document editing etc. Has HDMI input but no DP input. This can be remedied easily by buying the connector cable that converts DP to HDMI. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: edythe d  wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor for the price. Only downside is that while connected to my 2019 iMac, it sometimes "goes dim" and I have to turn it on/off real quick. I'd say it only happens once every other day at max.
customer_reviews.author: Imixer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and clear
customer_reviews.text: Needed a monitor that allowed connection to several computers via VGA and HDMI. This fit the bill at an affordable price. Switching is not as convenient as I would like but then again I only do it once or twice a day. Now that I have it, I really didn't need one this big.
customer_reviews.author: R. Howell

customer_reviews.title: I STRONGLY recommend that you stay away from this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February of 2018. It is now July and it won't turn on. Can't return it so I'm out $200. I STRONGLY recommend that you stay away from this product. Very dissapointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Walt Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful monitor, great viewing angles. Color is bright and clear. Tried the blue screen option, but it looks a little yellow for me so I don't use it. Bevels are nice and thin so if you're setting up two monitors you get a more fluid feel when transitioning between the two monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Sporty guy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Monitor; Great price
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 22 inch ASUS monitor with a thicker bezel which I've had for years. The monitor is stunning - looks gorgeous just sitting on my office desk. So far, works great for my use - web surfing, heavy email use, business purposes. I plan to edit some photos on it as well. The price is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain
customer_reviews.text: This monitor, amazing for the price. Very impressed. I actually prefer this HP-HD monitor over my UHD LG that costs 3 times the price.
customer_reviews.author: George G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a reasonable price. I’ve had it for a couple years now and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Conkey

customer_reviews.title: Not great for text.
customer_reviews.text: The text looks like crap on this, and that's partly the pixels, I know, but there's a weird flickereque
customer_reviews.author: Chris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: dumb monitor
customer_reviews.text: dumb monitor...specially when you are trying to connect it with dock station....takes a long time to be the second or third monitor. It blinks like 20 times!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A P

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing image quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for WFH set up. Nice screen which is nice but disappointing quality of the image. Seller shipped it quickly and it arrived without any damage. Would use the seller again but not buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Karelle

customer_reviews.title: great quality, clarity, but be aware of reflection.
customer_reviews.text: great clarify, great service, onetime and fast. benefited as Prime member. only criticism is it has a high degree of reflection. if using in dark, no issue, but I use as home office so be aware if you have bring backlighting. I may explore a screen shield if it becomes too annoying.
customer_reviews.author: TWM

customer_reviews.title: I received the monitor in the video...not the one in the pictures...
customer_reviews.text: The base is different...if that's all I suppose that's not a big deal but if you were counting on having that particular base for any reason...you may be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, way larger than I had thought that it would be. I primarily use it for when I work at home, because I hate using my small laptop screen. Great picture and quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: BIG SCREEN. Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I would have gave it a 5 star review only if it came with a few more options. I thought this screen came with a built in camera and speakers on the back... For the price i assumed it would be an all-in-one combo. Had to purchase the items separate. Other than that... GREAT SCREEN
customer_reviews.author: Brother J

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Good Looking, IPS is solid, bezel is kinda meh
customer_reviews.text: I use this for business. Needed a large 1080P monitor. Keep in mind with 27" the pixel density is low, so you will see pixels up close. I am spoiled with higher resolution monitors 3440x1440 is my main. But this works well for basic Microsoft office action.
customer_reviews.author: Timbo K

customer_reviews.title: Just that simple
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these monitors. They are perfect for my old eye and offer me plenty of working space when I have to have multiple screens up. Love it! Just that simple.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Adams

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is beautiful! It is also really
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is beautiful! It is also really, really light in weight. I was surprised, I am able to move it easily with one hand. This is good for me because I use it on a small light weight stand which may have been troublesome with a heavier item. This may or may not be a good thing for you, I'm not sure how much it would take to knock over--though the base seems sturdy enough so I'm not really worried about that happening.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased about 6 of these monitors at various times for my office. I do IT at work. They all have been great. Excellent quality and picture. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.3

customer_reviews.title: Great resolution, easy set up, and very inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Great resolution, easy set up, and very inexpensive. I use it with a 2015 13" Mac Book Pro, and it works like a charm. If you are a graphic designer who does print work or need higher resolution, go ahead and spend $500 or more. If you want a quality monitor that will help you work better (for a great price), this is your unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Monitor seems pretty nice for $108 bucks. HP packaging had been opened and resealed. CD was missing. Everything else seemed to be there. Set up was easy. Downloaded drivers from the net. All and all cant beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B. Edmund

product_meta.title: HP 27er 27-Inch Full HD 1080p IPS LED Monitor with Frameless Bezel and VGA & HDMI (T3M88AA), White
product_meta.description: Enjoy crisp, vibrant views from almost any angle at an ultra-affordable price with the HP 27er 27-in monitor. As our thinnest LCD display yet, the sleek design is easy on the eyes and designed to be lightweight so that you can easily move the monitor between workspaces. Ultra-wide viewing angles and a frameless monitor design provide vivid entertainment in Full HD (1920 x 1080) resolution. Conveniently connect to your devices with 1 VGA and 2 HDMI ports on the back of the monitor. Our monitors are also ENERGY-STAR certified to help you save on monthly energy costs. (Pixel pitch is 0.012 inches).
feature_bullets: Thin & lightweight — HP’s thinnest LCD display to date with a sleek, lightweight design for easy mounting and moving
Resolution & panel — 27-inch full HD monitor (1920 x 1080p @ 60 hertz) with 16:9 aspect ratio and an anti-glare matte IPS LED-backlit panel (7ms response time)
Bezel-less frame — A frameless ultra-widescreen provides a seamless multi-monitor set-up with 3-sided narrow bezels
Panoramic viewing — 178° horizontal and vertical viewing angles with adjustable tilt (-5° to 25°) for more comfortable viewing
Connectivity — 1 VGA and 2 HDMI with HDCP support for laptop or multi-monitor setups. Dimensions (W X D X H) - 24.45 x 1.4 x 14.63 in (without stand)
Color & quality — Technicolor color certified for color-accuracy with HP Enhance+ resolution for noise reduction to prevent picture overexposure
Custom OSD settings — Easily make room for more windows and add screen partitions with HP My Display software
Compatibility — Plug and play for all OS such as Windows & Mac OS for laptop connectivity (Note: USB-C/Thunderbolt 3-to-HDMI adapters required for 2016 MacBook Pros or later)
Responsibly made — Save your wallet with an Energy Star certified monitor that meets strict energy-efficiency guidelines and helps reduce your carbon footprint
Warranty — 1-year limited warranty with 24-hour, 7 days a week web support when shipped from and sold by Amazon

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,218 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
